Name: Marah
description:
Marah is a wonderful young woman who tries her utmost to make her family live a decent life. She is a 25-year-old refugee and a mother of three kids, living with her family in Tulkarem, West Bank. Her husband is the sole provider for the family; he works in farming with a seasonal income.

Marah wants to help her husband through work by selling agricultural seedlings in order to enhance her family's income. She turned to Palestine for Credit and Development (FATEN) to request a loan to buy tools and supplies needed for her work. This will improve the family's living standards. She hopes you will help by funding her loan.

Marah is a conservative woman; for that reason, her husband appears in the photo.
